name: Kaminey: The Scoundrels
tagline: The desperate lives of two estranged twin brothers converge over missing drugs, politics, racial prejudice, corrupt cops and an unplanned pregnancy.

name: Time Changer
tagline: A Bible professor from 1890 comes forward in time to the present via a time machine and cannot believe the things that he sees!

name: Jesus' Son
tagline: A young man turns from drug addiction and petty crime to a life redeemed by a discovery of compassion.

name: Startup.com
tagline: Traces the birth and failure of new media company govWorks.com.

name: The Road Home
tagline: Prompted by the death of his father and the grief of his mother, a man recalls the story of how they met in flashback.

name: The Rapture
tagline: A telephone operator living an empty, amoral life finds God and loses him again.

name: Cecil B. DeMented
tagline: An insane independent film director and his renegade group of teenage filmmakers kidnap an A-list Hollywood actress and force her to star in their underground film.

name: Paper Heart
tagline: Charlyne Yi embarks on a quest across America to make a documentary about the one subject she doesn't fully understand: Love.

name: Phat Beach
tagline: A hefty homeboy borrows his dad's Mercedes and goes to the beach with his friends for wild sun & fun.

name: China Girl
tagline: A modern day Romeo & Juliet story is told in New York when an Italian boy and a Chinese girl become lovers, causing a tragic conflict between ethnic gangs.

name: From Beyond
tagline: Scientists create a resonator to stimulate the pineal gland (sixth sense), and open up a door to a parallel (and hostile) universe. Based on a story by H. P. Lovecraft.

name: Micmacs
tagline: A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.

name: Roger Dodger
tagline: After breaking up with his lover and boss, a smooth-talking man takes his teenaged nephew out on the town in search of sex.

name: Dabangg
tagline: A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians.

name: The Abandoned
tagline: An adopted woman returns to her home country and the family home that she never knew and must face the mystery that lies there.

name: Gonzo: The Life and Work of Dr. Hunter S. Thompson
tagline: A portrait of the late gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.

name: Premature Burial
tagline: An artist grows distant from his new wife as an irrational horror of premature burial consumes him.

name: Home of the Brave: A Film by Laurie Anderson
The Legend of Blood Mountain
tagline: A small-town newspaperman begins to suspect that a wave of murders committed in the area may not be the work of a serial killer but a monster.

name: Lost Angels
tagline: A troubled youth from a split Los Angeles family is sent to a private psychiatric hospital after a violent scrape with the police. In the hospital, he makes a connection with one of the doctors who has his own problems.

name: Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story
tagline: Director Michael Winterbottom (Northam) attempts to shoot the adaptation of Laurence Sterne's essentially unfilmable novel, "The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman."

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

name: For a Good Time, Call...
tagline: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.

name: Take This Waltz
tagline: A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.

name: Dostana
tagline: Two straight guys pretend to be gay in order to secure a Miami apartment. When both of them fall for their roommate Neha, hilarity ensues as they strive to convince one and all that they're gay, secretly trying to win her heart.

name: The Invisible Woman
tagline: At the height of his career, Charles Dickens meets a younger woman who becomes his secret lover until his death.

name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
tagline: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.

name: Elephant
tagline: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

name: Swades
tagline: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: Metallica: Some Kind of Monster
tagline: A documentary crew followed Metallica for the better part of 2001-2003, a time of tension and release for the rock band, as they recorded their album St. Anger, fought bitterly, and sought the counsel of their on-call shrink.

name: Nine Queens
tagline: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

name: One Tough Cop
tagline: A detective tries to remain loyal to his partner, and his best friend - a mobster.

name: Without You I'm Nothing
tagline: Sandra Bernhard stars in a studio version of her off-Broadway show, blending re-enactments of the original show's pieces with concept vignettes and 'testimonials' to underscore the relationship between a performer and an audience.

name: Once Bitten
tagline: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

name: A Time of Destiny
tagline: A modernized version of the story which inspired Verdi's opera, "La Forza del Destino".

name: The Thin Blue Line
tagline: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.

name: Heyy Babyy

production.name: Films & Casting Temple Pvt. Ltd. Sydney

tagline: A baby is left outside the door of the three playboys. They don't know who the father is, but they can't let the baby go away.

name: Namastey London
tagline: A man takes his thoroughly-British daughter to his home country, India. There, he arranges a marriage to someone she considers a fool. The daughter attempts to outwit them, but the groom quietly and patiently hatches his own plan.

name: I'm the One That I Want
Inequality for All
tagline: A documentary that follows former U.S. Labor Secretary Robert Reich as he looks to raise awareness of the country's widening economic gap.

name: Like Stars on Earth
tagline: An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Beats, Rhymes & Life: The Travels of a Tribe Called Quest
tagline: Michael Rapaport documents the inner workings and behind the scenes drama that follows this innovative and influential band to this day.

name: Peter Kenna's The Good Wife
tagline: In pre-WWII Australia, a love triangle develops between a man, his wife and the man's brother.

name: Invasion U.S.A.
tagline: A group of people at a bar witness the unfolding events of a Soviet invasion of the USA.

name: Flawless
tagline: Set in 1960 London, where a soon to retire caretaker convinces a glass-ceiling constrained American executive to help him steal a handful of diamonds from their employer, the London Diamond Corporation.

name: District B13
tagline: Set in the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

name: Headhunters
tagline: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

name: When Night Is Falling
tagline: An uptight and conservative woman, working on tenure as a literacy professor at a large urban university, finds herself strangely attracted to a free-spirited, liberal woman who works at a local carnival that comes to town.

name: Cool as Ice
tagline: A rap-oriented remake of "The Wild One", with heavy emphasis on the fact that rap star Vanilla Ice has assumed the Marlon Brando role.

name: Dancers
tagline: A successful aging dancer takes a young female protegee.

name: Equilibrium
tagline: In a Fascist future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system.

name: The Lair of the White Worm
Kill the Irishman
tagline: The true story of Danny Greene, a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970's.

name: Ninotchka
tagline: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

name: Me and Orson Welles
tagline: A teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar" directed by a young Orson Welles in 1937.

name: Saving Face
tagline: A Chinese-American lesbian and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

name: 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days
tagline: Drama about a woman who assists her friend to arrange an illegal abortion in 1980's Romania.

name: Dylan Dog: Dead of Night
tagline: The adventures of supernatural private eye, Dylan Dog, who seeks out the monsters of the Louisiana bayou in his signature red shirt, black jacket, and blue jeans.
